submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList

class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        sl1 = SortedList()
        sl2 = SortedList()
        sl3 = SortedList()
        sl4 = SortedList()
        for x, y in points:
            sl1.add(x-y)
            sl2.add(x+y)
            sl3.add(-x-y)
            sl4.add(-x+y)
        ans = inf
        for x, y in points:
            sl1.remove(x-y)
            sl2.remove(x+y)
            sl3.remove(-x-y)
            sl4.remove(-x+y)
            ans = min(ans, max(sl1[-1] - sl1[0], sl2[-1] - sl2[0], sl3[-1] - sl3[0], sl4[-1] - sl4[0]))
            sl1.add(x-y)
            sl2.add(x+y)
            sl3.add(-x-y)
            sl4.add(-x+y)
        return ans
